title: Adjust the Lottery Ticket price to 5 CAKE !
body: With the increasing price of cake, a single lottery ticket costs now stunning 18,40 USD. With a price of 5 CAKE i think we can attract more people to join the lottery and increase the numer of cake burned/lottery volume. Vote NOW so chefs can see this. PANCAKESWAP is the best !
choices: Yes, adjust the price to 5 CAKE
author: 0xbDd9BE8555eA246BF2800C0abF2509426636E9D3
